message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
Come on, Alice! I'm taking a bit more since you'll lose value over time!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob, but I need to get a fair share too!  Let's call it a deal.
Alice, you're losing value fast! I'm willing to take a bigger share, but I'm still being generous!
Bob, I'm losing value quickly. This is my final offer.  If you reject it, I'm afraid you'll end up with nothing in the end.
